title: Offering Beautiful and Spacious 1 bedroom apartments in Center City
description: Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with FireplaceÂ . Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÂ . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: esteemed fairmount neighborhood
description:
Introducing two six two four, a bespoke build tailored to the finest level of detail, optimally located just above the iconic philadelphia museum of art, in philadelphia's esteemed fairmount neighborhood. This sun-soaked and stately 4bd x 3.5ba 3200 sf corner residence is equipped with a stunningly modern gourmet kitchen featuring custom mid-continent cabinetry, caesarstone cloudburst concrete quartz counters and backsplash, deluxe lg appliances, picture windows and dedicated workstation. Two six two four also features a sunken living and dining lounge; multiple outdoor spaces; powder room with pocket door and graham & brown wallpaper; led vanity mirrors throughout; dedicated home office with southern-facing museum vistas through french doors; dedicated high-tech fitness studio with tonal smart home gym; full floor primary suite; wet bar with matching kitchen finishes; custom closets in every bedroom; wide plank oak hardwood flooring throughout; soaring ceiling heights of up to 11+ feet; a fully-finished lower level complete with a full bathroom and in-law suite + storage; custom wainscoting in each of the upper-floor bedrooms; dual-zone high powered hvac with nest thermostat; matte black and brushed gold plumbing fixtures; custom railings throughout; and all of the perks of contemporary new construction luxury living (built 2019, refurbished 2022). Each level of the house is spatially maximized to take advantage of the natural light emanating throughout the dramatic corner property with 3 exposures (south, north, east). A rear garden off of the kitchen with seasonal planters and turf provides a quaint green space retreat and is ideal for light gardening. The 2nd-storey sun terrace lends itself perfectly to year-round outdoor entertaining and decompression. Savor the philly skyline and museum vistas â€“ especially during sunrise and sunset hours, as the hilltop corner setting overlooks the fairmount neighborhood including fairmount park to the west. And the juliet balcony off the primary suite provides an inspirational perspective from high above the city. Professionally designed and managed landscaping features include custom planters and window boxes around the perimeter of the property which are automatically controlled by an irrigation system for maintenance-free greenery and beauty throughout all 4 pennsylvania seasons, complementing the lush natural surrounds of fairmount park. The handsomely striking white brick exterior is checkered with dozens of oversized pella casement energy efficient windows. The substantial curb appeal is immediately noticeable from the property's commanding corner presence at the intersection of brown and taney streets. Coveted and convenient 1-car secure garage parking is included in the sale at the wagonworks building next door (prepaid for 3 years). The location is walkable to many of philly's most desirable amenities and attractions including boathouse row, philadelphia museum of art, fairmount park, schuylkill river trail, whole foods, center city (downtown), fairmount avenue commercial corridor and more. Neighborhood favorites brown street cafe, musette cafe and black sheep pub are a short stroll away, as well as a popular community dog park and playground overlooking kelly drive and the art museum. This distinguished residence offers incomparable value and comfort with first-class construction, supreme location, inspired interiors, enduring architecture and uplifting city views. Developed by hudson james homes and designed by ambit architecture - two leading philadelphia firms. The property is also available for sale.
2624 brown st

Single 47-year-old guy and his medium-sized dog seeking a pet-friendly rental in the greater Vancouver/Portland metro area — preferably one with a separate living area or even an ADU or back house, preferably — but I am flexible.
I’m currently living in my hometown in Southern California, but I’m hoping to secure a rental back up in the Pacific Northwest as soon as possible.
I lived for six months last year in Kelso, Washington, and I really liked the area; however, it was a bit too far from the Vancouver/Portland metro, so I’m looking for a rental a bit closer to the City (at least a bit closer). Also, I was living on a horse farm just north of Kelso, which was nice, but the rental unit itself was very old and in need of repair, so I decided it was best to leave. Electrical and plumbing issues galore over that six months!
My goal was to stay in Washington long-term, but I ended up returning to CA after six months (I actually have a Washington driver’s license and car plates).
Currently, I write online and drive for Uber/Lyft the rest of the time. I used to operate my own small petsitting service down in Southern California for several years prior to Covid; however, the pandemic and subsequent lockdown curtailed that for the past few years only to slowly return to normal recently.
My goal is to eventually establish myself in the Portland/Vancouver area and eventually relaunch a pet-care business up there. In the meantime, though, I’m looking to simply secure a small rental for the next 6 months or so.
I’m hoping to find a pet-friendly rental that has at least a small, fenced-in yard for my dog to use. Really, my dog is my only main concern; she’s young (2 years old) and loves to be outdoors. Unfortunately, though, she doesn’t always mesh well with other dogs, so ideally I need to find a place in which I can separate her from other animals (just to be prudent).
Personally, I don’t drink or smoke, don’t do drugs, and pretty much lead a very quiet, conservative lifestyle. No criminal background whatsoever. I’m respectful and pretty much just keep to myself.
I’m an introvert looking for a room to rent. I’m a friendly person, but NOT looking for a ‘community’ home or to share groceries with my roommate. I’m just a person that would love to live alone but cannot afford to live alone. Anyone else out there just trying to live there life and doesn’t feel a need to have all the same hobbies and interests and favorite movies with there roommate, let me know.

title: Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments.
description:
Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center city philadelphia apartments near rittenhouse square be a part of history! Icon mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theã‚â national register of historic places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown philadelphia apartment nearã‚â rittenhouse square? You've found it! Icon is the most exciting rental property to ever grace rittenhouse square. A quintessential example of the art deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, icon's design is inspired by art deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, icon is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the great depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both cunard's white star line and the united states lines, and the esteemed pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th floor. Today, this history echoes throughout icon, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its art deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚â stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of philadelphia. Enhanced penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair accessible apartments available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: sky deck with 360 view, includes grilling station and outdoor living area with fireplaceâ . Wellness floor featuring a yoga studio, cardio, weights, trx & boxingâ . Private dining room with fireplace and serving kitchen. Club level with kitchen, billiards, flat-screen tvs and large screen. Media room for private parties. Business center with computers, printers, conference rooms with a/v capabilities. Media roomã‚â . Full service concierge. Parking garage w/ valet parking option. Package receiving. Pet grooming station. On site property management. Elevator. Charging stations for electric cars. Cold storage for grocery delivery. 24 hour emergency maintenance. Pets welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-site green drop donation box. ** pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** photos are of model units ** parking may be available for additional fee **

title: build tailored to the finest level of detail
description:
Introducing two six two four, a bespoke build tailored to the finest level of detail, optimally located just above the iconic philadelphia museum of art, in philadelphia's esteemed fairmount neighborhood. This sun-soaked and stately 4bd x 3.5ba 3200 sf corner residence is equipped with a stunningly modern gourmet kitchen featuring custom mid-continent cabinetry, caesarstone cloudburst concrete quartz counters and backsplash, deluxe lg appliances, picture windows and dedicated workstation. Two six two four also features a sunken living and dining lounge; multiple outdoor spaces; powder room with pocket door and graham & brown wallpaper; led vanity mirrors throughout; dedicated home office with southern-facing museum vistas through french doors; dedicated high-tech fitness studio with tonal smart home gym; full floor primary suite; wet bar with matching kitchen finishes; custom closets in every bedroom; wide plank oak hardwood flooring throughout; soaring ceiling heights of up to 11+ feet; a fully-finished lower level complete with a full bathroom and in-law suite + storage; custom wainscoting in each of the upper-floor bedrooms; dual-zone high powered hvac with nest thermostat; matte black and brushed gold plumbing fixtures; custom railings throughout; and all of the perks of contemporary new construction luxury living (built 2019, refurbished 2022). Each level of the house is spatially maximized to take advantage of the natural light emanating throughout the dramatic corner property with 3 exposures (south, north, east). A rear garden off of the kitchen with seasonal planters and turf provides a quaint green space retreat and is ideal for light gardening. The 2nd-storey sun terrace lends itself perfectly to year-round outdoor entertaining and decompression. Savor the philly skyline and museum vistas â€“ especially during sunrise and sunset hours, as the hilltop corner setting overlooks the fairmount neighborhood including fairmount park to the west. And the juliet balcony off the primary suite provides an inspirational perspective from high above the city. Professionally designed and managed landscaping features include custom planters and window boxes around the perimeter of the property which are automatically controlled by an irrigation system for maintenance-free greenery and beauty throughout all 4 pennsylvania seasons, complementing the lush natural surrounds of fairmount park. The handsomely striking white brick exterior is checkered with dozens of oversized pella casement energy efficient windows. The substantial curb appeal is immediately noticeable from the property's commanding corner presence at the intersection of brown and taney streets. Coveted and convenient 1-car secure garage parking is included in the sale at the wagonworks building next door (prepaid for 3 years). The location is walkable to many of philly's most desirable amenities and attractions including boathouse row, philadelphia museum of art, fairmount park, schuylkill river trail, whole foods, center city (downtown), fairmount avenue commercial corridor and more. Neighborhood favorites brown street cafe, musette cafe and black sheep pub are a short stroll away, as well as a popular community dog park and playground overlooking kelly drive and the art museum. This distinguished residence offers incomparable value and comfort with first-class construction, supreme location, inspired interiors, enduring architecture and uplifting city views. Developed by hudson james homes and designed by ambit architecture - two leading philadelphia firms. The property is also available for sale.
2624 brown st

title: Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments.
description:
Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center city philadelphia apartments near rittenhouse square be a part of history! Icon mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theã‚â national register of historic places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown philadelphia apartment nearã‚â rittenhouse square? You've found it! Icon is the most exciting rental property to ever grace rittenhouse square. A quintessential example of the art deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, icon's design is inspired by art deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, icon is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the great depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both cunard's white star line and the united states lines, and the esteemed pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th floor. Today, this history echoes throughout icon, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its art deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚â stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of philadelphia. Enhanced penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair accessible apartments available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: sky deck with 360 view, includes grilling station and outdoor living area with fireplaceâ . Wellness floor featuring a yoga studio, cardio, weights, trx & boxingâ . Private dining room with fireplace and serving kitchen. Club level with kitchen, billiards, flat-screen tvs and large screen. Media room for private parties. Business center with computers, printers, conference rooms with a/v capabilities. Media roomã‚â . Full service concierge. Parking garage w/ valet parking option. Package receiving. Pet grooming station. On site property management. Elevator. Charging stations for electric cars. Cold storage for grocery delivery. 24 hour emergency maintenance. Pets welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent.
